news.title: Flu cases at record high for time of year as NHS warns of 'unprecedented' outbreak
news.summary: An average of 1,700 patients were in hospital in England with flu last week - more than 50% higher than the same period last year, figures show.

news.title: Novichok poisoning victim's family 'still has questions', as report finds Putin 'morally responsible'
news.summary: Dawn Sturgess, 44, died in 2018 after coming into contact with the nerve agent Novichok.

news.title: Have British spies learned lessons from the Skripal poisonings?
news.summary: Rusia's ability to target a defector with nerve agent is almost certainly diminished but it may pose other threats, the BBC's security correspondent writes.

news.title: Volcanic eruption may have triggered Europe's deadly Black Death plague
news.summary: A volcanic eruption may have set off a chain reaction that led to Europe's deadliest pandemic.

news.title: Putin says Russia will take Donbas by force or Ukraine's troops will withdraw
news.summary: The Russian leader's comments come as US and Ukrainian negotiators are due to hold a new round of talks.

news.title: Terror charges for man accused of driving Manchester synagogue attacker to UK defence site
news.summary: Greater Manchester Police confirms the 31-year-old was an associate of Jihad Al-Shamie.

news.title: Farage accuses BBC of double standards after racism allegations
news.summary: The Reform UK leader turns fire on the BBC as he faces further questions about allegations of teenage racism.

news.title: German president compares UK ties post-Brexit to Oasis
news.summary: Frank-Walter Steinmeier says both sides had decided to not look back in anger while referencing band's reunion.

news.title: Police officer sacked for groping colleagues at party
news.summary: A misconduct panel says PC Pamela Pritchard breached the force's standards of behaviour.

news.title: 'No more Average Joe': Root's elusive century seals his all-time great status
news.summary: Joe Root finally hitting the elusive Test century in Australia proves his status as one of the all-time great batters, says chief cricket reporter Stephan Shemilt.
